node.title: Thousands take to Melbourne streets in another protest against the vaccine mandate
node.description: Thousands of protesters gather in Melbourne's CBD to oppose the Victorian government's vaccination policies and proposed pandemic laws.
node.content:
["Thousands of protesters have gathered\u00a0in Melbourne's\u00a0CBD once again,\u00a0in another\u00a0week of demonstrations opposing the Victorian government's vaccination policies and proposed pandemic laws.\u00a0", "The group marched on the steps of parliament, weaving\u00a0through the city's streets with anti-government placards and flags.\u00a0", "A heavy police presence was\u00a0monitoring the\u00a0demonstrators as they walked through Bourke Street Mall amid chants, whistles and drums.", "", "
The group voiced opposition to the state government's pandemic bill.(ABC News:\u00a0Simon Winter)
", "The protesters have been calling for the Victorian government to scrap its\u00a0controversial pandemic bill, which is due to be voted on in the upper house.", "The\u00a0bill was designed to replace\u00a0State of Emergency laws that were used to bring in restrictions during the COVID-19 pandemic.", "The proposed legislation has been the subject of intense debate, attracting\u00a0protests outside the Victorian parliament for a number of weeks.", "", "
A crowd gathers\u00a0on the steps of the parliament in protest.(ABC News: Simon Winter)
", "Today's demonstration comes a week after rallies were held across Australian\u00a0cities as part of an international day of protest against COVID-19 lockdowns and vaccine mandates."]
